Different countries try to find different solutions for the dilemma that everybody would like to have their medical problems dealt with by the most specialised doctor, but without help the patient is not able to find out what exactly this illness may be.

We believe that the general practitioner should stand in the centre of medicine. With the necessary practice he can successfully diagnose and treat most patients or decide about the specialist to be consulted, the laboratory test or radiology method to be performed. This system saves the patient from being sent from specialist to specialist. Having a GP you can trust gives you a very important feeling of security.

(In case you do not need our general practitioner we shall refer you to the specialist of your choice.)
